page.title: 08LIFE STYLES
page.content: PARTS OF BARNET ARE JUST LIKE A VILLAGE,EVEN THOUGH THEY ARE SO CLOSE TO THE CENTRE OF LONDON. ALTHOUGH THERE ARE SOME LARGE SHOPPING CENTRES THERE ARE ALSO A GREAT NUMBER OF SMALL AND FRIENDLY SHOPS IN MANY AREAS. ONE OF THE EVENTS THAT ARE HELD IN THE AREA THAT MAKE IT LIKE A VILLAGE IS THE VILLAGE FAIR THAT IS HELD EVERY OTHER YEAR ON OAKHILL PARK. IT IS A BIG FAIR WITH LOTS OF STALLS, WHICH ARE RUN BY THE LOCAL PEOPLE AND THE NEARBY SCHOOLS. THIS YEAR THERE ARE GOING TO BE GAMES, COMPETITIONS, HOME-MADE JAMS AND CAKES, FACE PAINTING, LOTS TO BUY AND A LOT OF OTHER STALLS. IT IS GOOD FUN AND EVERYBODY ENJOYS THEMSELVES,HELPING ON STALLS AND SPENDING LOTS OF THEIR POCKET MONEY.
